## Outline of in-class portion {.midi}

-   Closed-book, closed-note.

-   10 questions, some with multiple parts

-   Question types:

    -   Multiple choice
    -   Short answer (no more than 3 sentences)
    -   True/ False.
        -   If false, write 1 - 2 sentence justification about why it is false.
    -   Evaluate a response.

-   Last page (front and back) will have analysis output.

-   Just need a pencil. No calculator permitted on exam.
